xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/998839-CTRL-V 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qMRAKWs1AmYUfziHtREt2At7us4.jpg Documentary-research on the global audiovisual industry and its effects on local cultures. Produced with a homemade digital camera in the best do-it-yourself style, without any production apparatus, director Leonardo Brant uses excerpts from films that discuss the hegemonic condition of the cultural industry and promotes dialogue with great thinkers. CTRL-V
